channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man pleads guilty to murder and attempted murder in shooting at suburban Chicago July 4 parade
item.description: An Illinois man pleaded guilty Monday to killing seven people and injuring dozens more when he opened fire on a 2022 Independence Day parade in a Chicago suburb, a stunning development moments before opening statements in his trial on murder and attempted murder charges.

item.title: Crews battle wildfires in North and South Carolina amid dry conditions and gusty winds
Lethal injection, electrocution and now firing squads. A look at US execution methods
